verses.verse: Then <S%G5119><s%> was <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> led <S%G321>up<s%> <S%G5259>of<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4151>spirit<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2048>wilderness<s%> to be <S%G3985>tempted<s%> <S%G5259>of<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1228>devil.<s%>
And <S%G2532><s%> when he had <S%G3522>fasted<s%> <S%G5062>forty<s%> <S%G2250>days<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5062>forty<s%> <S%G3571>nights,<s%> he was afterward <S%G3983>hungry.<s%> <S%G5305><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> when <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3985>tempter<s%> <S%G4334>came<s%> to <S%G846>him,<s%> he <S%G2036>said,<s%> <S%G1487>If<s%> thou <S%G1488>be<s%> the Son <S%G5207>of<s%> <S%G2316>God,<s%> <S%G2036>command<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> <S%G3778>these<s%> <S%G3037>stones<s%> be <S%G1096>made<s%> <S%G740>bread.<s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3588>he<s%> <S%G611>answered<s%> and <S%G2036>said,<s%> It is <S%G1125>written,<s%> <S%G444>Man<s%> shall <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G2198>live<s%> <S%G1909>by<s%> <S%G740>bread<s%> <S%G3441>alone,<s%> <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G1909>by<s%> <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G4487>word<s%> that <S%G1607>proceedeth<s%> out <S%G1223>of<s%> the <S%G4750>mouth<s%> of God. <S%G2316><s%>

Then <S%G5119><s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1228>devil<s%> taketh him <S%G3880>up<s%> <S%G846><s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G40>holy<s%> <S%G4172>city,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2476>setteth<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> a <S%G4419>pinnacle<s%> of <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2411>temple,<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3004>saith<s%> unto <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G1487>If<s%> thou <S%G1488>be<s%> the <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> <S%G906>cast<s%> <S%G4572>thyself<s%> <S%G2736>down:<s%> <S%G1063>for<s%> it is <S%G1125>written,<s%> He shall give his angels <S%G1781>charge<s%> <S%G848><s%> <S%G32><s%> <S%G4012>concerning<s%> <S%G4675>thee:<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1909>in<s%> their <S%G5495>hands<s%> they shall bear thee <S%G142>up,<s%> <S%G4571><s%> lest at any <S%G3379>time<s%> thou <S%G4350>dash<s%> <S%G4675>thy<s%> <S%G4228>foot<s%> <S%G4314>against<s%> a <S%G3037>stone.<s%>

Jesus <S%G2424><s%> <S%G5346>said<s%> unto <S%G846>him,<s%> It is <S%G1125>written<s%> <S%G3825>again,<s%> Thou shalt <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G1598>tempt<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G4675>thy<s%> God. <S%G2316><s%>

Again, <S%G3825><s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1228>devil<s%> taketh him <S%G3880>up<s%> <S%G846><s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> an <S%G3029>exceeding<s%> <S%G5308>high<s%> <S%G3735>mountain,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1166>showeth<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G932>kingdoms<s%> of <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2889>world,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1391>glory<s%> of <S%G846>them;<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3004>saith<s%> unto <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G3956>All<s%> these <S%G5023>things<s%> will I <S%G1325>give<s%> <S%G4671>thee,<s%> <S%G1437>if<s%> thou wilt fall <S%G4098>down<s%> and <S%G4352>worship<s%> <S%G3427>me.<s%>

Then <S%G5119><s%> <S%G3004>saith<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> unto <S%G846>him,<s%> Get thee <S%G5217>hence,<s%> Satan: <S%G4567><s%> <S%G1063>for<s%> it is <S%G1125>written,<s%> Thou shalt <S%G4352>worship<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G4675>thy<s%> <S%G2316>God,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G3441>only<s%> shalt thou serve. <S%G3000><s%>

Then <S%G5119><s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1228>devil<s%> <S%G863>leaveth<s%> <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G2532>and,<s%> <S%G2400>behold,<s%> <S%G32>angels<s%> <S%G4334>came<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1247>ministered<s%> unto <S%G846>him.<s%>
Now <S%G1161><s%> when <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> had <S%G191>heard<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G2491>John<s%> was cast into <S%G3860>prison,<s%> he <S%G402>departed<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G1056>Galilee;<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G2641>leaving<s%> <S%G3478>Nazareth,<s%> he <S%G2064>came<s%> and <S%G2730>dwelt<s%> <S%G1519>in<s%> <S%G2584>Capernaum,<s%> which is upon the sea <S%G3864>coast,<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G3725>borders<s%> of <S%G2194>Zebulun<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> Naphtali: <S%G3508><s%>
That <S%G2443><s%> it might be <S%G4137>fulfilled<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> was <S%G4483>spoken<s%> <S%G1223>by<s%> <S%G2268>Isaiah<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4396>prophet,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%>

The <S%G1093>land<s%> of <S%G2194>Zebulun,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G1093>land<s%> of <S%G3508>Naphtali,<s%> by the <S%G3598>way<s%> of the <S%G2281>sea,<s%> <S%G4008>beyond<s%> <S%G2446>Jordan,<s%> <S%G1056>Galilee<s%> of <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1484>Gentiles;<s%>

The <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2992>people<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> <S%G2521>sat<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G4655>darkness<s%> <S%G1492>saw<s%> <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G5457>light;<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> to them which <S%G2521>sat<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G5561>region<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4639>shadow<s%> of <S%G2288>death<s%> <S%G5457>light<s%> is sprung <S%G393>up.<s%>

From <S%G575><s%> that <S%G5119>time<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G756>began<s%> to <S%G2784>preach,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> to <S%G3004>say,<s%> Repent: <S%G3340><s%> <S%G1063>for<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G932>kingdom<s%> of <S%G3772>heaven<s%> is at hand. <S%G1448><s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> <S%G2424>Jesus,<s%> <S%G4043>walking<s%> <S%G3844>by<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2281>sea<s%> of <S%G1056>Galilee,<s%> <S%G1492>saw<s%> <S%G1417>two<s%> <S%G80>brethren,<s%> <S%G4613>Simon<s%> <S%G3004>called<s%> <S%G4074>Peter,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G406>Andrew<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G80>brother,<s%> <S%G906>casting<s%> a <S%G293>net<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2281>sea:<s%> <S%G1063>for<s%> they <S%G2258>were<s%> <S%G231>fishers.<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> he <S%G3004>saith<s%> unto <S%G846>them,<s%> Follow <S%G1205><s%> <S%G3694><s%> me, <S%G3450><s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> I will <S%G4160>make<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%> <S%G231>fishers<s%> of men. <S%G444><s%>
And <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3588>they<s%> <S%G2112>straightway<s%> <S%G863>left<s%> their <S%G1350>nets,<s%> and <S%G190>followed<s%> <S%G846>him.<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> going <S%G4260>on<s%> from <S%G1564>thence,<s%> he <S%G1492>saw<s%> <S%G243>other<s%> <S%G1417>two<s%> <S%G80>brethren,<s%> <S%G2385>James<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> son of <S%G2199>Zebedee,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2491>John<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G80>brother,<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> a <S%G4143>ship<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G2199>Zebedee<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G3962>father,<s%> <S%G2675>mending<s%> <S%G848>their<s%> <S%G1350>nets;<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> he <S%G2564>called<s%> <S%G846>them.<s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> they immediately <S%G863>left<s%> <S%G2112><s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4143>ship<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G848>their<s%> <S%G3962>father,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G190>followed<s%> <S%G846>him.<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> went <S%G4013>about<s%> <S%G3650>all<s%> <S%G1056>Galilee,<s%> <S%G1321>teaching<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G4864>synagogues,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2784>preaching<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2098>gospel<s%> of <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G932>kingdom,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2323>healing<s%> all <S%G3956>manner<s%> of <S%G3554>sickness<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> all <S%G3956>manner<s%> of <S%G3119>disease<s%> <S%G1722>among<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2992>people.<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G189>fame<s%> <S%G565>went<s%> <S%G1519>throughout<s%> <S%G3650>all<s%> <S%G4947>Syria:<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> they <S%G4374>brought<s%> unto <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> sick <S%G2192>people<s%> <S%G2560><s%> that were <S%G4912>taken<s%> with <S%G4164>divers<s%> <S%G3554>diseases<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G931>torments,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> those which were possessed with <S%G1139>devils,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> those which were <S%G4583>lunatic,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> those that had the <S%G3885>palsy;<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> he <S%G2323>healed<s%> <S%G846>them.<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> there <S%G190>followed<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G4183>great<s%> multitudes of <S%G3793>people<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G1056>Galilee,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> from <S%G1179>Decapolis,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> from <S%G2414>Jerusalem,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> from <S%G2449>Judea,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> from <S%G4008>beyond<s%> <S%G2446>Jordan.<s%>
